title: DOP-C02 Monitoring & Incident Response: Enterprise Event-Driven Automation
certificationWeight: Critical Domain - Monitoring, Logging & Incident Response
description: Master enterprise monitoring, incident response automation, and event-driven architectures. This expert-level lab covers AWS CloudWatch, EventBridge, Systems Manager to Azure Monitor, Event Grid, and Logic Apps migration with advanced automation patterns, self-healing systems, and intelligent incident response workflows.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive monitoring strategies using CloudWatch → Azure Monitor
Design event-driven automation with EventBridge → Event Grid patterns
Build intelligent incident response workflows with automated remediation
Create self-healing systems with proactive monitoring and response
Configure advanced alerting, escalation, and notification systems
Implement observability best practices with distributed tracing and metrics
Design automated incident detection and response workflows
Build enterprise-grade monitoring dashboards and reporting
prerequisites: Expert knowledge of AWS CloudWatch, EventBridge, and Systems Manager
Advanced Azure Monitor, Event Grid, and Logic Apps experience
Understanding of incident response frameworks (ITIL, PagerDuty patterns)
Experience with monitoring automation and observability patterns
Knowledge of event-driven architectures and microservices monitoring
Familiarity with enterprise alerting and escalation procedures
businessScenario: GlobalTech Corp operates a mission-critical e-commerce platform across 12 regions with strict SLA requirements (99.99% uptime, <200ms response time). They need to migrate their comprehensive AWS monitoring and incident response system to Azure while maintaining enterprise-grade observability, automated incident detection, intelligent response workflows, and proactive self-healing capabilities. The system must handle 10M+ events daily with sub-minute incident detection and automated remediation for 80% of common issues.

sections.title: Enterprise Monitoring Architecture Migration
topics: CloudWatch comprehensive monitoring → Azure Monitor enterprise setup
Multi-dimensional metrics and custom metrics migration

tasks.title: Migrate CloudWatch Metrics to Azure Monitor

tasks.title: Application Performance Monitoring (APM) Setup

troubleshooting.issue: Event Grid delivery failures and dead letter accumulation
troubleshooting.solution: Configure retry policies, implement exponential backoff, set up dead letter queue monitoring with automated replay logic

troubleshooting.issue: Alert fatigue and noise in notification systems
troubleshooting.solution: Implement intelligent alert grouping, configure severity-based routing, set up alert suppression rules and correlation logic

troubleshooting.issue: Logic Apps workflow timeouts in incident response
troubleshooting.solution: Optimize workflow execution, implement asynchronous patterns, configure proper timeout handling and workflow monitoring

troubleshooting.issue: Application Insights sampling affecting trace completeness
troubleshooting.solution: Configure adaptive sampling, implement intelligent sampling strategies, ensure critical traces are always captured

troubleshooting.issue: Cross-region monitoring latency and data consistency
troubleshooting.solution: Implement regional monitoring hubs, configure data replication strategies, optimize network routing for monitoring traffic
